properties.areaDesc: Norwood MI to 5NM West of Mackinac Bridge including Little Traverse Bay; Seul Choix Point to 5NM West of Mackinac Bridge; Grand Traverse Bay south of a line Grand Traverse Light to Norwood MI
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued February 4 at 3:07AM EST until February 4 at 11:00PM EST by NWS Gaylord MI
properties.description:
* WHAT...Highest gusts up to 25 kt and highest waves around 4
feet.

* WHERE...Grand Traverse Bay south of a line Grand Traverse
Light to Norwood MI, Seul Choix Point to 5NM West of Mackinac
Bridge and Norwood MI to 5NM West of Mackinac Bridge including
Little Traverse Bay.

* WHEN...Until 11 PM EST this evening.

* IMPACTS...Conditions will be hazardous to small craft.
properties.instruction:
Inexperienced mariners, especially those operating smaller
vessels, should avoid navigating in hazardous conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 PM EST THIS EVENING
